title: How about my number of wins on ARAM before?

replies.body: I'm not sure I'm really understanding the issue.  ARAM doesn't have ranked, and we don't have tools to access accounts for the Philippines.  Toss me some more context so I can better understand what's going on.

>context 

I can supply that for you:
https://1drv.ms/i/s!AuFMZD__7mN2gxZzbDc2kFvFFevC 
_My, my, 2237 ARAM wins - that's 1287 less than now._ :P

He's talking about the old profile badges, showing the number of games played - and "quest ranking" - in the different queues.

I'd like those back too.

https://1drv.ms/i/s!AuFMZD__7mN2gVYXOGVx4DsebjAH
The high-ELO match spectating too.

And a specific IP counter (not just a "K" at the end).

>ARAM doesn't have ranked

Why not make it so? After all, Dominion was promised to get that once. ;)
http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=1064930&page=1#post12526346

I miss the profile icons for normals and ARAM too QQ
I hope they eventually bring something like that back.
